channel.title: Error conecting to server
channel.description:
OK so i have a PI server and client and no matter what i do when i change my ip on client it still wont connect to my server (on vps), i tried a different client didnt work, i tried the moparscape 3.2 client it worked!! but loged in and out, i tired the newer 4.1 mopar client... did not work.... every client except the old mopar client keeps saying error connecting to server
any suggestions on what to do

item.title: Error conecting to server
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:4, topic:427026”]The only reason you can connect with the Mopar client is because it automatically starts a server for you.

Why did you buy a VPS if you can’t even connect to localhost? Lol.[/quote]

i can obviously connect to localhost…
and no it will connect to your server when you put that IP in hence why in server status you can choose to play next to the guys name…

some people need to think/read

and yes the vps is ported correctly it just says error connecting to server but i changed all the ports/ip’s to mine (se7enscape.no-ip.org and 43594) from localhost

Read full topic

item.title: Error conecting to server
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The only reason you can connect with the Mopar client is because it automatically starts a server for you.

Why did you buy a VPS if you can’t even connect to localhost? Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Error conecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Unicron Unicron
item.description:
@Unicron wrote:

what EXACTLY is the error message? If it’s an ‘Error cannot connect’ then you’ve got a number of reasons this occurs.

Read full topic
